title: The 5 best iRobot vacuums of 2023
description: An iRobot vacuum can take the stress -- and labor -- out of house cleaning. Of all the models, the best iRobot vacuum is the iRobot Roomba s9+ to tackle even your dirtiest floors.

title: Gen Z uses lots of emojis to communicate. Here's what they really mean
description: On Slack, Gen Z uses emojis, memes, GIFs, and TikToks to convey a message to their colleagues. Usually, they're used in the place of words to communicate a deeper message.

title: Learn to solder: Tools, tips, and tricks to get you started the easy way
description: Soldering wires and components is a key skill in electronic repairs. But it can be a tough and sometimes frustrating skill to learn. Here's what you need to know to get started.

title: How to use Apple Pay in stores and online
description: The convenience of Apple Pay goes beyond not having to take out your wallet at stores. Many online retailers now accept it at checkout without your having to enter your card number.

title: She got sick and tired of self-checkout, so she did something about it
description: In a fascinating twist, someone who loathes self-checkout at Walmart uses her power to try and effect change.
